name: Classy Ms. Pac-Man
description:
Classy Ms. Pac-Man

This is a remake of the classic Ms. Pac-Man game, with a recreated level and an innovation level that introduces a variety of new mechanics. This project was created for the subject 31263 Introduction to Computer Game Development at the University of Technology, Sydney.

How to play:Recreation level
  • WASD/ARROW KEYS to move
  • Consume power pills to eat ghosts for points
  • Collect all the pellets and get the highest score possible!
Innovation level
  • Consuming a power pill or ghost will reveal the ghost colours
  • Consuming ghosts grants Ms. Pac-Man a new effect
    • Blinky: Ms. Pac-Man now moves rapidly in a straight line, only being able to turn once slowed down
    • Pinky: Creates a Ms. Pac-Man clone that performs all the same inputs the original did
    • Inky: Ms. Pac-Man now leaves an ink trail that slows down anything caught in it
    • Sue: Pressing SPACEBAR will remove Sue's effect from Ms. Pac-Man, and trigger a Power Pill effect.
